# babel-plugin-nodejs-import-images

```javascript
import img from './img.jpg'
```

will be transformed to

```
const img = require('fs').readFileSync('./img.jpg')
```





so you can use it like this

```javascript
import img from './img.png'
const app = new Koa()

app.use(function * (next) {
  this.type = 'image/png'
  this.body = img
})
```
